enumeration.name: role
enumeration.description: The possible roles of a player

enumerated-output-symbol.name: next_action
enumerated-output-symbol.description: The next action to be performed

enumerated-input-symbol.name: role
enumerated-input-symbol.description: The dynamically assigned role of the player

decimal-input-symbol.name: x
decimal-input-symbol.description: The x position of the player

decimal-input-symbol.name: y
decimal-input-symbol.description: The y position of the player

decimal-input-symbol.name: ball.x
decimal-input-symbol.description: The x position of the ball

decimal-input-symbol.name: ball.y
decimal-input-symbol.description: The y position of the ball

enumerated-input-symbol.name: ball.local.direction
enumerated-input-symbol.description: The direction of the ball if in the local area of the player. If the ball is not in the local area, undefined is returned

decimal-input-symbol.name: most_westerly_teammate.x
decimal-input-symbol.description: The x position of the most westerly teammate
